divs: Sighting Detailsthe ufo that i see have mutch color and stay stoped in the skay i talk with my friend and when i saw de sky one fing whith boomerang shape was stoped . 10 minutes after this fings flew fast and disapeared. i dont belive what hapened but other day in november i saw this ufo again it was stoped in the sky again and after 10 or 9 minutes fly fast again i stay mutch scared. in the first time my friend dont see the ufo because he was in the window of jis house and i was in the street and the ufo apered in the skay behind his house.
